main.name: Elton Bezerra da Silva
main.description: I am a software engineer at Itaú Unibanco and I'm currently working with Java (Spring and JBoss). This project is my resume page, where you can check my work, knowledges and experiences.
main.bio: I'm passionate about tech and financial market, with more than 2 years of experience working in Agile Projects, using the framework Scrum in different companies.
main.contactmessage: I'm currently trying to work on single projects, if you want to get in touch, you can fill this form or send me a message in WhatsApp.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: I've studied Java, Software Engineering (Including OOP, UML, REST, Design Patterns from GoF and so on),  also learned about DBs (such as Oracle and SQLServer), Testing and Networks.

This was the place that I've first me programming, I've learned about the basis, such as Algorithms and Programming logic, Obejct-Oriented Programming, Databases (Mostly SQLServer and MySQL). Linux (shell scripting, iptables), web development with HTML, CSS and PHP and so on..

work.title: Software Enginner - I
work.description: Currently working with Java, JBoss, SQLServer, and doing a lot of integrations between different systems in the Cybersecurity area.

work.title: Systems Analyst - I
work.description: I worked with the development of webservices using an internal tool, and also in the development of Jobs with Spring Batch.

work.title: Web Application Developer
work.description: I worked on agile projects (Scrum + Kanban), creating and maintaining REST APIs with Spring Boot.

work.title: Build to Plan - Intern
work.description: I worked with Java / Nodejs development using tools and technologies like Spring Boot, MongoDB. In addition to creating API tests using Mocha, Chai and Supertest and creating and maintaining API documentation using the OpenAPI (Swagger) standard.

work.title: Backend Developer - Intern
work.description: Implementation and maintenance of APIs using PHP with CodeIgniter framework; Implementation and maintenance of the front end in some projects that work with HTML, CSS, AngularJS, Javascript and JQuery.
